name: PAYROLL MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
short_description:
1.0	INTRODUCTION

Payroll Management system tends to be a prefer system in Human Resource (HR) department of most organizations. This management system is use to perform some calculations which include: calculation on tax to be deducted from salary, deduction of fund from salary. All these calculations are done according to the rules structure of the organization, after which the pay slip will be generated.
However, I try to understand and confirm the fact that most standard organizations have little or no interest in management of pay slips, paper document, report on payroll, detail on payroll, etc.
1.2	RATIONAL AND CONTEXT
The actual purpose for the development of this payroll system is to allow the provision of easy automation of some form of functionalities which include: management of leaves and employees payroll system of the organization. However, there is a full report that contains the detail about payment of staff salary submitted to the management of the organization.
